column9: My girl,, she isn't the one
column11: And sometimes I don't know which way to go
column12: And I tried to run before
column14: Because I've fought against it hard enough to know
column19: Oh,, you can't make yourself stop dreaming
column25: My boy ain't the one that I saw coming
column26: And some have said his heart's too hard to hold
column27: And it takes a little time
column28: But you should see him when he shines
column29: You never want to let that feeling go
